entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the main characters who helps Harry escape from the Dursleys' house. He throws a rope to Harry and drives the car to pull out the bars from the window.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another main character who needs to escape from the Dursleys' house. He ties the rope around a bar and gets into the car with his friends.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl who keeps still and silent while Fred and Ron are trying to escape from the Dursleys' house.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who helps him escape from the Dursleys' house. He hoists the bars into the car and tells Harry to get in.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel relatives who live in the house where Harry is trying to escape from. They are mentioned as being asleep when Fred and Ron try to escape.

relationships.description: Fred helps Harry by throwing a rope to him and driving the car to pull out the bars from the window.
Ron lifts the bars into the car with Fred's help.
Harry is trying to escape from the Dursleys' house with the help of his friends Fred and Ron.
